snippet: The first volume of the first Italian translation of the Babylonian Talmud took dozens of scholars, linguists, philologists and editors five years to complete.
abstract: Italian state-funded Project Talmud presents first-ever Italian translation of Babylonian Talmud, 1,500-year-old collection of Hebrew and Aramaic writings on science and philosophy whose complexity has resulted in few translations; latest translation is result of five-year effort by dozens of scholars, linguists and others.
lead_paragraph: The first volume of the first Italian translation of the Babylonian Talmud took dozens of scholars, linguists, philologists and editors five years to complete.

headline.main: Italians, Helped by an App, Translate the Talmud
